mapper.select: select ITEMFILENAME,substr(ITEMNAME,1,8) ITEMNAME,max(END_DATE) END_DATE from USING_ITEM u,my_item m,itemlist i where u.MYITEM_NO=m.MYITEM_NO and m.ITEMLIST_NO=i.ITEMLIST_NO and u.START_DATE-u.END_DATE<=0 and m.member_id=#{memberid} and i.ITEMTYPE != 2 and i.ITEMTYPE != 8 group by ITEMFILENAME,substr(ITEMNAME,1,8)

select MYITEM_NO from( select MYITEM_NO from ( select MYITEM_NO from USING_ITEM where MYITEM_NO in ( select MYITEM_NO from MY_ITEM where MEMBER_ID=#{memberid} and ITEMLIST_NO in (select ITEMLIST_NO from itemlist where ITEMTYPE = 2 and MYITEM_STATUS !=2 ) )) order by rownum desc) where rownum= 1

select USING_ITEM_NO from USING_ITEM where USING_ITEM_NO != 0 and MYITEM_NO in ( select MYITEM_NO from MY_ITEM where MEMBER_ID=#{memberid} and ITEMLIST_NO in (select ITEMLIST_NO from itemlist where ITEMTYPE = 2 and MYITEM_STATUS !=2 ) )
mapper.insert: insert into USING_ITEM values((select max(USING_ITEM_NO)+1 from USING_ITEM),#{useritempk},sysdate,sysdate)

insert into using_item values( (select max(USING_ITEM_NO)+1 from USING_ITEM), #{useritempk} , sysdate , sysdate+( select ITEMPERIOD from itemlist where ITEMLIST_NO = (select ITEMLIST_NO from my_item where MYITEM_NO=#{useritempk})))

insert into using_item values( (select max(USING_ITEM_NO)+1 from USING_ITEM),#{useritempk}, (select max(end_date) from USING_ITEM u ,MY_ITEM m,ITEMLIST i where u.START_DATE-u.END_DATE<=0 and u.MYITEM_NO=m.MYITEM_NO and m.ITEMLIST_NO=i.ITEMLIST_NO and m.MEMBER_ID = (select MEMBER_ID from MY_ITEM where MYITEM_NO= #{useritempk} ) and i.itemtype = (select ITEMTYPE from ITEMLIST where ITEMLIST_NO = (select ITEMLIST_NO from MY_ITEM where MYITEM_NO = #{useritempk}))) , ((select max(end_date) from USING_ITEM u ,MY_ITEM m,ITEMLIST i where u.START_DATE-u.END_DATE<=0 and u.MYITEM_NO=m.MYITEM_NO and m.ITEMLIST_NO=i.ITEMLIST_NO and m.MEMBER_ID = (select MEMBER_ID from MY_ITEM where MYITEM_NO= #{useritempk} ) and i.itemtype = (select ITEMTYPE from ITEMLIST where ITEMLIST_NO = (select ITEMLIST_NO from MY_ITEM where MYITEM_NO = #{useritempk})))+(select ITEMPERIOD from itemlist where ITEMLIST_NO = (select ITEMLIST_NO from my_item where MYITEM_NO=#{useritempk}) )))
mapper.select: select count(*) from USING_ITEM u ,MY_ITEM m,ITEMLIST i where u.START_DATE-u.END_DATE<=0 and u.MYITEM_NO=m.MYITEM_NO and m.ITEMLIST_NO=i.ITEMLIST_NO and m.MEMBER_ID = (select MEMBER_ID from MY_ITEM where MYITEM_NO= #{useritempk} ) and i.itemtype = (select ITEMTYPE from ITEMLIST where ITEMLIST_NO = (select ITEMLIST_NO from MY_ITEM where MYITEM_NO = #{useritempk}) )
mapper.insert: insert into item_log values((select max(ITEM_LOG_NO)+1 from ITEM_LOG),(select USING_ITEM_NO from USING_ITEM where MYITEM_NO = #{useritempk}),1,sysdate)
insert into item_log values((select max(ITEM_LOG_NO)+1 from ITEM_LOG),(select USING_ITEM_NO from USING_ITEM where MYITEM_NO = #{useritempk}),2,sysdate)
mapper.select: select ITEMFILENAME from itemlist where ITEMLIST_NO = ( select ITEMLIST_NO from MY_ITEM where MYITEM_NO=( select MYITEM_NO from( select MYITEM_NO from ( select MYITEM_NO from USING_ITEM where MYITEM_NO in ( select MYITEM_NO from MY_ITEM where MEMBER_ID= #{memberid} and ITEMLIST_NO in (select ITEMLIST_NO from itemlist where ITEMTYPE = 2 ) )) order by rownum desc) where rownum= 1))
